alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Southern Clark County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 21 at 2:31AM PST until January 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM PST /11 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Nevada, southern Clark County and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, eastern San Bernardino County. In Arizona, Lake Mead National Recreation Area, Fort Mohave, and Lake Havasu. * WHEN...From 10 AM PST /11 AM MST/ this morning to 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous boating conditions. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Hazardous driving conditions on east-to-west roadways for high-profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wave heights between 1 and 3 feet expected through the day today, and returning Saturday. Dangerous crosswinds possible along Interstate 15 between Barstow-Daggett and Primm as well as along Interstate 40 between Barstow-Daggett and Needles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Southern Clark County
